name: Daopunks
description: DAOpunks is a platform that blazes new trails, leading others to fertile promised lands where they find opportunity, meaningful work, community, and untold abundance. DAOpunks’s mission is to enable humans to liberate themselves from the soul-sucking drudgery of default world work and lead them to the rewarding, expansive freedom found in meaningful DAO work.

name: niftyz
description: The Niftyz platform empowers businesses to boost their growth, by betokening and monetizing their growth, achievements, content, members and more, by using NFTs to lock and distribute their most precious information and assets to the most wanted audience.

name: protocol labs
description: Onchain.storage is an ecosystem of storage products built on top of Ethereum (and Polygon) and IPFS/Filecoin. We're building the project from scratch to help Protocol Labs translate the theoretical protocol into Smart Contracts, Oracle nodes and Providers interfaces. The first protocol is called Retrieval Pinning and adds 'retrievability assurance' on top of decentralized storage.

name: xone
description: Xone is the first mobile application in the metaverse. With Xone, you can create the next evolution of social media with personal 3D spaces taking the place of user profiles. Xone users can build, own and monetize their personal spaces in 3d and explore them through augmented reality technology.

name: Fakewhale
description: Fakewhale is an organization led by artists, collectors, and entrepreneurs. Founded in January 2021, Fakewhale has been supporting the digital underground scene by collecting more than 1000 pieces since the inception of Tezos tokens.

name: nft berlin
description: NFTBERLIN is a non-profit annual unconference on NFTs inspired by the community of passionate NFT artists and technologists, that provides an open, chain-agnostic platform for learning, exchanging ideas, and sharing experiences.

name: Spaghetteth
description: Second edition of an event organized by the Italian eth community. 3 days of talks, project presentations and educational activities. A new way of networking.

name: HNFT
description: Hosted by DADA, the First Historic NFT Fest brings together the creators, innovators, and thinkers who started it all for three days of deep dive into the earliest NFT projects on blockchain up to 2019.

name: cult&rain
description: CULT & RAIN is a disruptive digital fashion brand, merging innovative NFT art with exclusive high-end physical redeemable. A unique platform and creative playground showcasing the best artists from around the world.

name: house of sangu
description:
House of Sangu is an interconnection of artists and NFT enthusiasts that works together toward the creation of an ecosystem of people that wants to help each other and grow together.
Sangu’s first initiative is the first edition of an NFT magazine and exhibition that every year will travel to a new country around the world

name: Zonzo
description: Zonzo is an app to discover cities by walking and playing mini-games. You can purchase an itinerary and it will guide you along an experience designed for the places you are visiting.

name: martix
description: Martix is a digital art world where you can visit and create art galleries. It was born with the aim of hosting interesting galleries and collections and organizing events within the platform itself.

name: well b
description: Well-b is an innovative digital coworking that uses blockchain technology to notarize space leases and a digital platform that records all transactions from booking to accessing spaces.

name: Endor
description: Endor is a Lorem Ipsum Agency with a deep knowledge of the Web3 market. With Lorem Ipsum method they refer to the consolidated crystallization of their procedure, which ideally evolves infinitely, supporting customers in the latest communication technologies.

name: PIM
description: PRESS IS MORE is a press and communications agency operating in the art, music and entertainment sectors. Their mission is to elaborate and implement ad hoc communication and promotional strategies, both online and offline, to guarantee the best visibility and media presence.

name: Aristoil
description: The Aristoil Cluster has established a procedure to manage and validate an accreditation system to support Aristoil 'Health Claim Indication' using Blockchain technology. A technology that allows the tracking and certain certification of the entire production chain.
